alert.note: Alert for Grant; Natchitoches; Red River; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 10:06AM CDT until May 11 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1006 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles east of Coushatta to 7 miles southwest of Campti to 14 miles east of Converse, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Winnfield, Campti, Montgomery, Allen, Natchez, Clarence, Goldonna, Calvin, Atlanta, Powhatan, Lake End, Grand Ecore, St. Maurice, Joyce, Black Lake, Clear Lake, Creston, Bermuda and Hagewood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.
